Package io.sphere.sdk.client

Provides types to connect to SPHERE.IO via HTTPS.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BlockingSphereClient
    A client for commercetools which provides thread blocking and non-blocking methods to execute a request.
    SphereAccessTokenSupplier
    Provides an OAuth token for accessing protected Sphere HTTP API endpoints.
    SphereApiConfig
    Configuration to make request for a SPHERE.IO web service, does not include authentication configuration or tokens.
    SphereAuthConfig
    Contains the configuration to fetch access keys for SPHERE.IO.
    SphereClient
    A client interface to perform requests to SPHERE.IO.
    SphereClientFactory
    A factory to instantiate SPHERE.IO Java clients which use CompletionStage as future implementation.
    SphereRequest<T>
    An argument for a sphere client to execute an HTTP API call on the level of one SPHERE.IO project.
    TokensSupplier  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeprecationExceptionSphereClientDecorator
    If SPHERE.IO returns a "X-DEPRECATION-NOTICE" header field, it does not deserialize the response object in SphereRequest.deserialize(HttpResponse) but throws a SphereDeprecationException.
    HttpRequestIntent  
    JsonEndpoint<T>  
    JsonNodeSphereRequest  
    QueueSphereClientDecorator  
    SphereAccessTokenSupplierFactory  
    SphereAsyncHttpClientFactory  
    SphereClientConfig
    The full configuration for a SPHERE.IO client.
    SphereClientDecorator  
    SphereClientUtils  
    SphereHttpHeaders  
    SphereRequestDecorator<T>  
    SphereRequestUtils  
    TestDoubleSphereClientFactory
    A factory to instantiate SPHERE.IO Java clients which use CompletionStage as future implementation.
    TimeoutSphereClientDecorator
    Wraps a SphereClient to add timeouts.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadGatewayException
    On the server occurred a problem, try again later.
    BadRequestException
    HTTP code 400 response from SPHERE.IO.
    ClientErrorException
    Exceptions for SPHERE.IO http responses with an error code 4xx.
    ConcurrentModificationException
    HTTP code 409 response from SPHERE.IO.
    ErrorResponseException

    Error Codes
    GatewayTimeoutException
    This error might occur on long running processes such as deletion of resources with connections to other resources.
    InternalServerErrorException  
    InvalidClientCredentialsException  
    InvalidTokenException  
    NotFoundException
    Known causes: Updating a object which does not exist (anymore)
    RequestEntityTooLargeException
    HTTP code 413 response from SPHERE.IO.
    ServerErrorException
    SPHERE.IO answered with a HTTP response code of >= 500.
    ServiceUnavailableException
    The SPHERE.IO API is currently not available.
    SphereDeprecationException  
    SphereServiceException
    Exception thrown when SPHERE.IO responds
    with a status code other than HTTP 2xx.
    SphereTimeoutException  
    UnauthorizedException  

Package io.sphere.sdk.client Description

Provides types to connect to SPHERE.IO via HTTPS.
